channel.title: Justin Trudeau
channel.description: Recent news about Justin Trudeau, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great day in Papineau today, door knocking and meeting constituents. Thank you for the feedback and the encouragements! #cdnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Super journée dans Papineau aujourd’hui, du porte à porte et de belles rencontres. Merci pour les commentaires et encouragements! #polcan

item.title: Mentioned by City News
item.description:
RADIA: The potential prime minister on pot? Now way - The Tri
Having said that, I don't want my local mayor, MLA or MP smoking pot. And I certainly do ... A couple of weeks ago, federal Liberal leader Justin Trudeau admitted to taking a puff of cannabis three years ago at a party after becoming a member of Parliament.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: An increased humanitarian role for Canada in Syria is the right way to go. We need to support the people through this terrible war. #cdnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Un rôle humanitaire accru du Canada en Syrie est la bonne approche. On doit soutenir la population à travers cette guerre terrible. #polcan

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: This year, summer student employment was once again near record lows and middle class parents will continue to struggle. #cdnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Cette année, l’emploi étudiant était encore au plus bas et les parents de la classe moyenne continueront d’écoper. #polcan

item.title: Mentioned by Montreal Gazette
item.description:
Letter: Punish, don't reward, convicted MPs
I wrote to Harper, NDP leader Thomas Mulcair, Liberal leader Justin Trudeau and my MP, Stéphane Dion, as well as John Williamson, the MP who has introduced this bill. We must clearly indicate to Ottawa that we as Canadians will not tolerate this abuse, ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Telegram
item.description:
NL MP admits using pot
Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau also made headlines last month when he admitted he has not only used marijuana, but has used it while he was a sitting member of Parliament. Since then, a number of other politicians have jumped into the pot debate.

item.title: Mentioned by The Telegram
item.description:
N.L. MP admits using pot
Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau also made headlines last month when he admitted he has not only used marijuana, but has used it while he was a sitting member of Parliament. Since then, a number of other politicians have jumped into the pot debate.

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Conservative MP Tweed's resignation now official in Brandon-Souris riding, four ...
Four byelections that could be crucial for Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau are now set for an undisclosed date likely in early November after Commons Speaker Andrew Scheer officially notified Chief Electoral Officer Marc Mayrand of the fourth House vacancy ...

item.title: Mentioned by Kapuskasing Northern Times (subscription)
item.description:
Justin Trudeau: My fair Liberal
Justin Trudeau has been an MP for five years, and leader of his party for five months. So last week, at a press scrum in Prince Edward Island, reporters asked him why he hasn't released a set of policies yet. What does he stand for, other than being really, ...
